title: Defiance
description: Leisha and Samantha barely survived. Now, an explosive battle between the vampires and immortals seems imminent. It's more important than ever before that the prophecy child is found, but there's a problemâ€”Leisha has lost her powers. She seems like nothing more than a human. Her newfound humanity is further complicated when Tafari, her old lover, appears with a desire for reconcliation.Can Leisha lock up the past to save those she loves? Or will fate tear everything from her once again?
author: Adrienne Monson
